verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:30
verses.text: If any thing be revealed to another that sitteth by, let the first hold his peace.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:31
verses.text: For ye may all prophesy one by one, that all may learn, and all may be comforted.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:32
verses.text: And the spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:33
verses.text: For God is not the author of confusion, but of peace, as in all churches of the saints.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:34
verses.text: Let your women keep silence in the churches: for it is not permitted unto them to speak; but they are commanded to be under obedience, as also saith the law.
